The modules delaunay.c, hash.c, istack.c, lpi.c, minell.c, nnai.c,
nncommon-vulnerable.c, nncommon.c, nnpi.c, config.h, delaunay.h, hash.h,
istack.h, minell.h, nan.h, nn.h, nn_internal.h, and version.h in libiwarp were
obtained from Pavel Sakov's 'nn' package and are covered by this license
(note that Triangle is not included in the library):
